snippet: Instead of abiding by a commitment to a cease-fire negotiated with the United Nations, the president of Syria has continued his killing spree.
abstract: Editorial contends that Syria's Pres Bashar al-Assad has clearly abandoned his commitment to the United Nations-negotiated cease-fire; argues that the time has come for Russia and China to renounce their support for Assad's regime and for the UN to impose broader international sanctions to reinforce those already enacted by Washington and the European Union.
lead_paragraph: Instead of abiding by a commitment to a cease-fire negotiated with the United Nations, the president of Syria has continued his killing spree.

headline.seo: The Latest Bluff of President Bashar al-Assad in Syria

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
